segments.content: * 🗓 [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC2025\&utm_source=TWIRpartnership\&utm_content=savethedate) - 🇵🇱 Wrocław - 2-4 September. Star speaker announced! Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR".

**[这就是你无法交付产品的原因](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14)**

segments.content: Some red flags [PostHog](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14-ph) has found in teams failing to ship fast: waiting for 1:1s to solve problems, needing other teams to approve your work, and sales outnumbering engineering 🚩
segments.sourceMdx: Some red flags [PostHog](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14-ph) has found in teams failing to ship fast: waiting for 1:1s to solve problems, needing other teams to approve your work, and sales outnumbering engineering 🚩
segments.translated_content: [PostHog](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14-ph)发现阻碍团队快速交付的几大危险信号：等待1对1会议解决问题、需要其他团队审批工作、销售人员数量超过工程师🚩

segments.content: Learn how to identify and fix each of these (and more) in [the latest edition of their Product for Engineers newsletter](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14) 💪
segments.sourceMdx: Learn how to identify and fix each of these (and more) in [the latest edition of their Product for Engineers newsletter](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14) 💪
segments.translated_content: 阅读[他们最新一期《工程师产品指南》](https://go.posthog.com/twir-may14)，了解如何识别并解决这些问题（还有更多内容）💪

segments.content: Set up subscriptions in your B2B or B2C app without writing custom payment code or building your own UI.
segments.sourceMdx: Set up subscriptions in your B2B or B2C app without writing custom payment code or building your own UI.
segments.translated_content: 无需编写支付代码或自建UI，即可为B2B/B2C应用配置订阅服务。

segments.content:
* Create a pricing page with the `<PricingTable />` component
* Connect with Stripe—no manual API calls, no manual syncing
* Manage plans and entitlements all within the Clerk dashboard
* `has()` helper to control access based on a customer’s plan, features, and permissions
* Manage user and subscription data all in one place
segments.sourceMdx:
- Create a pricing page with the `<PricingTable />` component
- Connect with Stripe—no manual API calls, no manual syncing
- Manage plans and entitlements all within the Clerk dashboard
- `has()` helper to control access based on a customer’s plan, features, and permissions
- Manage user and subscription data all in one place
segments.translated_content:
- 使用`<PricingTable />`组件创建定价页面
- 无缝对接Stripe——无需手动API调用或数据同步
- 在Clerk仪表盘中统一管理套餐和权限
- 通过`has()`辅助函数根据用户套餐、功能权限控制访问
- 一站式管理用户与订阅数据

segments.content: Enable Billing, drop in `<PricingTable/>` on your `/pricing` page and [start monetizing your application](https://go.clerk.com/LphCouG).
segments.sourceMdx: Enable Billing, drop in `<PricingTable/>` on your `/pricing` page and [start monetizing your application](https://go.clerk.com/LphCouG).
segments.translated_content: 启用Billing功能，在定价页面嵌入`<PricingTable/>`组件，立即[实现应用变现](https://go.clerk.com/LphCouG)。
